imprint.disclaimer_text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

privacy.gen_text: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this data protection declaration.
privacy.vercel_text: This website is hosted on Vercel. Vercel collects log files (IP addresses) for security and performance reasons.
privacy.supabase_text: We use Supabase for authentication and database services. When you sign up via Email (Magic Link), your email address is stored in our database hosted by Supabase.
privacy.data_account_text: We only store your email address to create your account. We do not store passwords.
privacy.data_usage_text: We store the tank names, tasks, and images you upload.
privacy.img_text: Images uploaded to tasks are stored in a public bucket to allow your sitter to view them without login. Please do not upload sensitive personal information in these images.
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to request information about your stored data, its origin, its recipients, and the purpose of its collection at any time. You also have the right to request that it be corrected, blocked, or deleted.
